an8.10:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava campayam viharati gaggaraya pokkharaniya tire.
an8.10:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.10:1.3: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano annenannam paticarati, bahiddha katham apanameti, kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an8.10:2.6: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa tadisamyeva hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam bhikkhunam—
an8.10:2.8: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhu apattim passanti, tamenam evam jananti:
an8.10:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, sampanne yavakarane yavadusi jayetha yavapalapo yavakarandavoti.
an8.10:3.2: Tassa tadisamyeva mulam hoti, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam yavanam;
an8.10:3.3: tadisamyeva nalam hoti, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam yavanam;
an8.10:3.4: tadisamyeva pattam hoti, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam yavanam—
an8.10:3.6: Yato ca khvassa sisam nibbattati, tamenam evam jananti:
an8.10:3.8: Tamenam iti viditva samulam uppatetva bahiddha yavakaranassa chaddenti.
an8.10:4.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa puggalassa tadisamyeva hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam bhikkhunam—
an8.10:4.3: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhu apattim passanti, tamenam evam jananti:
an8.10:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mahato dhannarasissa phunamanassa tattha yani tani dhannani dalhani saravantani tani ekamantam punjam hoti, yani pana tani dhannani dubbalani palapani tani vato ekamantam apavahati.
an8.10:5.2: Tamenam samika sammajjanim gahetva bhiyyoso mattaya apasammajjanti.
an8.10:5.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa puggalassa tadisamyeva hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam bhikkhunam—
an8.10:5.7: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhu apattim passanti, tamenam evam jananti:
an8.10:6.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso udapanapanaliyatthiko tinham kutharim adaya vanam paviseyya.
an8.10:6.2: So yam yadeva rukkham kutharipasena akoteyya tattha yani tani rukkhani dalhani saravantani tani kutharipasena akotitani kakkhalam patinadanti;
an8.10:6.3: yani pana tani rukkhani antoputini avassutani kasambujatani tani kutharipasena akotitani daddaram patinadanti.
an8.10:6.4: Tamenam mule chindati, mule chinditva agge chindati, agge chinditva anto suvisodhitam visodheti, anto suvisodhitam visodhetva udapanapanalim yojeti.
an8.10:6.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa puggalassa tadisamyeva hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam, seyyathapi annesam bhaddakanam bhikkhunam—
an8.10:6.7: Yato ca khvassa bhikkhu apattim passanti, tamenam evam jananti:
